data.taskTitle: statusactionbadge > pause session > does not remove task/session from active tasks
summary: Fixed missing pause action handler in TasksActive.svelte onAction callback
The pause button in StatusActionBadge dropdown was not wired to any action - actionId="pause" fell through all if/else conditions
Added handler that: (1) sets optimistic "paused" state for instant UI feedback, (2) calls POST /api/sessions/{name}/pause with task details
Pause API writes paused signal and kills the tmux session, removing it from active tasks on next poll
